#FFFFFF

What is a Warn?

The "Worker Adjustment and Retraining Notification Act" (WARN) is a law that requires employers to provide employees experiencing employment loss with a 60-day notice prior to a layoff, although some exceptions apply. The WARN protects workers, their families, and communities from the impact of mass layoffs.

Attention:

We are only able to accept WARNs by e-WARN and email. We are no longer accepting hard copies.

E-WARN: E-WARN Form
Email WARN: RRTeam@state.co.us 

#FFFFFF

View Warn Listings

Submitted Warns

You can view Colorado plant closures and layoff notices issued under the WARN.
WARN notices are considered public records in compliance with the Colorado Open Records Act C.R.S.: 24-72-201 to 24-72-309.
